title: Altman Goes Code Red : OpenAI Pauses Side Projects to Boost ChatGPT Speed & Trust
description: What happens when the leader of one of the world’s most influential AI companies declares a “code red”? For Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, this isn’t just a dramatic turn of phrase, it’s a battle cry in the escalating war for AI dominance. With Google’s Gemini 3 …
